address2: 14th and 15th floor 222, Vibhavadi Rangsit Road Tungsonghong, Laksi
longBusinessSummary: Electricity Generating Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity to government sector and industrial users primarily in Thailand, Laos, the Philippines, Indonesia, Australia, South Korea, Taiwan, and the United States. The company operates through  Electricity Generation and Other Businesses segments. It generates electricity from various resources, such as biomass, hydropower, solar and wind power, battery energy, and fuel cell. In addition, the company is involved in coal mining business, as well as engages in developing real estate activities. It operates power plants with total capacity of 7,023 Mw equity and projects under construction and total equity contracted capacity of 1,418 Mw. The company provides operation, maintenance, engineering, and construction services to power plants, petrochemical plants, oil refineries, and other industries. Electricity Generating Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
